sentences.en: Christopher Reeve, Superman, had a terrible accident riding a horse.
sentences.cn: 超人的 饰演者 克里斯托弗?里夫, 在一次骑马时发生了严重意外.

sentences.en: Collor nurtured the idea that he was a superman, who single-handedly could resolve Brazil's crisis.
sentences.cn: 考乐抱有一个想法，即他是可以一手解决巴西危机的超人。

sentences.en: Daming: And the characters I like are heroes like Superman or Batman.
sentences.cn: 大明: 并且我喜欢的角色是像超人或蝙蝠侠那样的英雄.

sentences.en: He is a superman in mental faculties [ physical strength ].
sentences.cn: 他在智力 [ 体力 ] 上是个超人.

sentences.en: He is a superman in mental faculties.
He is a superman in physical strength.
I think Superman probabIy has a very good sense of humour.
sentences.cn: 我认为超人可能有非常好的幽默感.

sentences.en: I will try, but despite what you all may think, I am not Superman.
sentences.cn: 我会努力想的, 但我也不是超人啊.

sentences.en: IE Superman is a completely free, you can use and disseminate it.
sentences.cn: IE超人是完全免费的, 您可以使用和传播它.

sentences.en: If I'm dark skinned, then you're Superman.
sentences.cn: 如果我是黑皮肤, 你就是超人了.

sentences.en: In 1934, Jerry Siegel and Joe Shuster created Superman.
sentences.cn: 在1934年, 杰瑞?西格尔和乔?舒斯特创造了超人.
乔喜欢看《超人》的漫画书。

sentences.en: Oh, he is really a superman.
sentences.cn: 噢, 他可真是个超人.

sentences.en: Superman came to earth on a rocket ship.
sentences.cn: 超人坐着装备火箭的舰船来到地球.

sentences.en: Superman's gonna fIy around Earth and turn back time?
sentences.cn: 超人绕着地球飞几圈让时光倒流?

sentences.en: Yesterday I saw an old Superman movie.
sentences.cn: 昨天,我看了旧版的超人电影.

phrases.tran_cn: 人与超人（萧伯纳的戏剧）

trans.tran_cn: 具有超常能力的人，超人
trans.tran_en: a man of unusually great ability or strength
